description.value:
You are a cleric of the cloth, focusing on divine magic and your connection to your deity's domains.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.First Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{First Doctrine (1st)} You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Domain Initiate]{Domain Initiate} cleric feat.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{Second Doctrine (3rd)} Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Third Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{Third Doctrine (7th)} Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Fourth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{Fourth Doctrine (11th)} You gain expert proficiency with your deity's favored weapon. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using that weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect; use your divine spell DC if necessary.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Fifth Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{Fifth Doctrine (15th)} Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to master.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Final Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)]{Final Doctrine (19th)} Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to legendary.
